# [Interview #1127: Figment Chat Q&A - January 19th, 2015, Entry #11](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1127#11)

#### Question

Does First of the Sun have a Shard or a Splinter?

#### Brandon Sanderson

First of the Sun does not have a Shard. First of the Sun is one of these planets that was created, in the cosmere Iâ€™m considering a low magic planet, not under the direct influence of any Shard.
